name: Blink (itch) (Battledrake)
description:
You're a robot on a distant planet, charged with the care of a genetically altered feline species called Blinkers. A recent storm blew out the generator keeping the Blinkers in captivity. Now that the field is back up, it's up to you to round up as many of them as possible before the Master returns.

Made in just over 48 hours for the GameDevHQ gamejam!

#gamedevhqgamejam #scifi #unity #pickles #notapprovedbypeta
